'''Emma Myers''' (born April 2, 2002)<ref name="age"/> is an American actress. She began her career as a child actress in 2010 but gained her recognition for starring in the comedy horror series ''{{w|Wednesday (TV series)|Wednesday}}'' and the mystery series ''{{w|A Good Girl's Guide to Murder (TV series)|A Good Girl's Guide to Murder}}''.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
Myers is the actress portraying {{AMCM|Natalie}} in {{AMCM}}. She was revealed to be featuring in the movie in late 2023<ref>{{Citation|url=https://deadline.com/2023/12/minecraft-emma-myers-wednesday-1235655987/|title=‘Minecraft’: ‘Wednesday’ Star Emma Myers Digs Into Warner Bros Movie|author=[https://deadline.com/2023/12/minecraft-emma-myers-wednesday-1235655987/ Anthony D'Alessandro]|website=Deadline|date=December 6, 2023}}</ref><ref>{{ytl|GX0CCm0MZL0|Kickin' axe in the Overworld. #MinecraftMovie - only in theaters 2025.|Warner Bros. Pictures|November 19, 2024}}</ref> and made her first appearance as Natalie on September 4, 2024 in the movie's teaser trailer.

Myers also made an appearance during [[Minecraft LIVE – March 2025]], revealing a clip of the film and announcing [[A Minecraft Movie Live Event]]. Later in the after show, she played the event map along with [[Jens Bergensten]] and [[Agnes Larsson]].

Myers also appeared in a short segment in the video "Minecraft - Shape your world", pressing a button that leads to a piston door that opens.
